Package com.segment.analytics

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Analytics.OnIntegrationReadyListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Analytics
    The idea is simple: one pipeline for all your data.
    Analytics.Builder
    Fluent API for creating Analytics instances.
    AnalyticsContext
    Context is a dictionary of extra, free-form information about a specific API call.
    Options
    Options let you control behaviour for a specific analytics call, including setting a custom timestamp and disabling integrations on demand.
    Properties
    Just like traits, we also imbue some properties with semantic meaning, and you should only ever use these property names for that purpose.
    Properties.Product  
    StatsSnapshot  
    Traits
    Traits can be anything you want, but some of them have semantic meaning and we treat them in special ways.
